markdown:
Summary : This image displays the logo for Icetea Software, featuring a stylized red geometric emblem above the company name in two font weights.

logo: Icetea Software

Logo Elements :
  • Central emblem: Red geometric design composed of interlocking lines forming a stylized "S" shape within a diamond outline.
  • Two small red diamond shapes flanking the central emblem horizontally.
  • Text below emblem: "Icetea Software" with "Icetea" in a thin, light sans-serif font and "Software" in bold black sans-serif font.

Colour & Placement :
  • Emblem and diamonds: Solid red (#D32F2F).
  • Text: "Icetea" in grey, "Software" in black.
  • Emblem centered above text, with equal spacing.

Dimensions & Duplication Cues :
  • Emblem height approximately equal to combined text height.
  • Text is horizontally aligned, with "Software" visually heavier due to bold weight.

Analysis :
  • The logo uses a modern, geometric style to convey a sense of technology and precision.
  • The bold "Software" emphasizes the company's core business, while the red emblem provides a distinctive brand mark. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.894,t=0.000,r=0.969,b=0.093), with ID 7d827f3e-d094-487b-b1a1-53e2d36b9ba0 -->

Summary : This digital illustration highlights the concept of ISO 27001:2022 certification, using a futuristic, technology-themed design with a virtual hand interacting with a circular interface.

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • Main subject is a glowing blue circular interface with a virtual, wireframe hand (index finger extended) appearing to press or interact with the center.
  • The right side prominently displays the text: "ISO 27001:2022 CERTIFICATION" in large, bright blue letters.
  • Surrounding the central circle are six smaller circular icons, each with a different symbol: group of people, globe, checklist, gear, shield with checkmark, and a lightbulb.
  • The background is a deep blue with concentric digital rings and geometric patterns, evoking a high-tech, cybersecurity theme.

Technical Details :
  • No scale bar or physical measurement; purely illustrative.
  • All text and icons are digitally rendered in shades of blue and cyan.
  • The interface and hand are semi-transparent, with glowing edges and a holographic effect.

Spatial Relationships :
  • The virtual hand is in the lower center, reaching up to the main circle.
  • The ISO certification text is aligned horizontally to the right of the main circle, occupying the right third of the image.
  • The six icons are evenly distributed around the central circle, forming a ring.

Analysis :
  • The image visually communicates the importance of ISO 27001:2022 certification in the context of digital security and information management.
  • The use of a virtual hand and digital interface reinforces themes of technology, interactivity, and modern compliance standards.
  • The arrangement and glowing effects draw attention to the certification as a central, actionable goal. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.286,t=0.108,r=0.823,b=0.670), with ID 63e02648-a972-4a66-82a3-bcf627d7c9b3 -->

4. QUY ĐỊNH AN TOÀN THÔNG TIN TẠI ITS <!-- text, from page 0 (l=0.086,t=0.742,r=0.851,b=0.842), with ID f9772008-f6f3-4a47-a59d-f5c05e1eacd3 -->

27 <!-- marginalia, from page 0 (l=0.907,t=0.939,r=0.927,b=0.968), with ID 1efd09d9-40c2-4c2c-82c0-ed9dfe080590 -->
